name: Mark Target
description: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.  When a marked enemy dies, you heal for 6611.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Mark Target active at a time.
coefDescription: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.  When a marked enemy dies, you heal for $1.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Mark Target active at a time.
